title: Visit to an airport
creator_credit: Gibson Film Productions, Dave Gibson and Yvonne MacKay
brief_description: Two children visit an airport and learn about various aspects of its operation; luggage checks, plane checks, take-off procedures, control tower operations, food preparation and movement of food into the planes.
creator_credit_for_label: Gibson Film Productions, Dave Gibson and Yvonne MacKay
